raw_comment:
I wonder how California, Texas and Florida get first sight of leaves if their states are always warm?

Name ideas:
Are you leafing me?
First sights of leaves
ace_sentences: The author wonders how California gets a first sight of leaves.
The author wonders how Texas gets a first sight of leaves.
The author wonders how Florida gets a first sight of leaves.
The author assumes that California is always warm.
The author assumes that Texas is always warm.
The author assumes that Florida is always warm.
The author proposes a name idea.
The name idea is: Are you leafing me?
The author proposes another name idea.
The name idea is: First sights of leaves.
